Search

Landfill
--------

Landfill
--------

The City of Stanton and Martin County Landfill is open **Monday** through **Friday** from **9:30am** to **5:30pm (trash needs to be finished being unloaded by customers by 5:00 p.m. This will allow employees time to cover-up the trash). The Landfill is for *MARTIN COUNTY/CITY OF STANTON RESIDENTS* only**.

**\*\*DO NOT put tires in dumpsters, it is ILLEGAL DUMPING. Illegal dumping is punishable by fines up to $15,000.\*\***

**\*\*EFFECTIVE IMMEDIATELY- Refrigerators will only be accepted if they have a certified sticker verifying the freon has been properly removed. This requirement ensures compliance with environmental regulations.\*\***

The Landfill is closed on Saturday and Sunday.  The Landfill is managed by Landfill Manager, Mike Prado and landfill technician is Rey Marquez.  All City of Stanton/Martin County residents can use the Landfill at no cost.  Please call 432-756-3301 or 432-756-3302 if you have questions concerning the landfill.

[Holiday Schedule](https://cityofstantontx.com/city-of-stanton-holidays/)

[Map](https://cityofstantontx.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/City-of-Stanton-landfill-location-002.png)

Contact Information
-------------------

* **City of Stanton**   
  P O Box 370, Stanton   
   TX 79782-0370
* [**Main Number:**  
   432-756-3301](tel:4327563301)
* [**Water Department:**  
   432-756-3302](tel:4327563302)
* [**Police Department:**  
   432-756-3303](tel:4327563303)
* [For after-hour calls or emergencies, call the **Martin County Sheriff Office  
   (432-756-3336)** to get in touch with the City personnel who are on-call.](tel:4327563336)
* [cityofstantontx@gmail.com](mailto:cityofstantontx@gmail.com%20%20)
* **The City of Stanton Attorney   
  Paige Skehan**   
  Ms. Skehan can be contacted at P O Box 81, Rankin, Texas, 79778
* Our offices are open from  
   **Monday - Friday**  
   8:00 am to 5:00 pm   
  The offices are closed on most holidays.

   432-756-3303](tel:4327563303)

   (432-756-3336)** to get in touch with the City personnel who are on-call.](tel:4327563336)

* **The City of Stanton Attorney   
  Paige Skehan**

* Our offices are open from  
   **Monday - Friday**  
   8:00 am to 5:00 pm   
  The offices are closed on most holidays.
